title: Endzone 2
description:
Endzone 2 is a post-apocalyptic survival colony builder , where you embark to secure humanityâ€™s survival after a cataclysmic disaster. Discover and repopulate the last habitable grounds, while the survival of your people hinges on your wits, foresight, and resilience in a harsh and unforgiving world. Hatred
Survive in a world of constant threats, including radioactively contaminated ground, droughts, toxic rain, and sandstorms. Grow and expand your settlement, research technologies, refine resources, and manage your economy by building an efficient infrastructure .

system_requirements.OS: Windows 10 or higher (64-bit processor and operating system)
system_requirements.Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX1070/AMD Radeon RX580 Series
